decision_conditions: T23: The replacement tree must be planted by April 2024; the trees should be of Tilia species and of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted. | Failure to do so will result in a tree replacement notice under section 207 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | It is recommended that planting takes place between the months of October and March but being careful to avoid periods of waterlogging or hard frost. | If the new tree's species is different from that removed, then Ealing's Planning department must be consulted before planting is completed.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
